questions.question: Is the woman’s hairstyle still platinum blonde with shoulder-length soft waves?
questions.explanation: Image B does not show any human figures; it only features a fragrance bottle. Since there is no depiction of a woman’s hairstyle in Image B, there is no platinum blonde hairstyle with shoulder-length waves to be observed or compared.

questions.question: Are the black vertical slats with copper horizontal lines still present in the background?

questions.question: Is the small red clutch still visible in the woman’s right hand?

questions.question: Does the fragrance bottle retain the elongated, flowing silhouette of the original dress?
